channel.title: My server wont go on server status page
channel.description: When i try and put my server on teh server status page i get this message: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'benpkz.no-ip.biz' OR `ipfield` = '**.**.**.**'' at line 1

item.title: My server wont go on server status page
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:

IF YOU READ THE STICKIES IN THE RIGHT FUCKING SECTION ITS NOT FUCKING BROKEN YOU BANNED DUMBASSES

EDIT:: READ!!! http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,219926.0.html

i get same error plz help us?[/quote]

Please read?

item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

Read the stickies, this isn’t a error to do with you, there having some problems. (OR YOU GOT AUTO BANNED OR JUST BANNED!) If you got auto banned, then you need to talk to moparisthebest… If you got banned for something you did, then thats YOUR problem.

delta:

Status page is broken until moparisthebest fixes it

omfg delta!!! I just was starting to post before you beat me again…
